## Short Keys to remember

|short key            |의미  
|:--------------------|:-------------
|Ctrl + Enter         |한줄 실행
|Ctrl + Shift + S     |전체실행
|Ctrl + L             |clear console
|Alt + -              |insert "<-"
|Ctrl + Shift + M     |insert "%>%"
|Ctrl + Shift + C     |(un)comment lines
